text: (Jwalakwe ni) Nkugumba mawunde ni mataka. Am’biichiile achiwammakwenu kuumila mu ntundu wenu (wachiwaandu), nombe ilango (ayiwiichiile soni) achiwammakwao (kuumila mu ntundu wao wachinyama), akasan’gumbaga mwakuntupiya mwalakwemo (kupitila mu kusimangana kwa chachilume ni chachikongwe). Pangali chilichose chakulandana ni Jwalakwe (Allah), soni Jwalakwe ni Jwakupikanichisya, Jwakulolechesya
